channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Amazon brade déjà à moins de 20 € sa nouvelle clé HDMI équipée de la nouvelle interface Vega OS
item.description: Le géant Amazon, déjà bien installé dans nos salons via sa boutique et nos programmes du soir, pousse encore plus loin son emprise en s’invitant directement dans le système qui fait tourner nos téléviseurs. Avec son nouvel OS Vega et sa clé HDMI remise au goût du jour, le Fire TV Stick 4K Select s’offre un tarif de fin d’année presque indécent.

item.title: This $1,500 robot cooks dinner while I work
item.description: As I'm sitting in my office writing this review, delicious, cheesy, garlicky scents are wafting up the stairs. I can hear whizzing and whirring, and the occasional clunk, as a robot chef in my kitchen is making macaroni and cheese. Its app tells me there are three minutes left in the process, and based on […]

item.title: I’ve driven the new Tesla Model Y Performance — and despite it being a great car, it isn't anywhere near as exciting as it once was
item.description: Tesla's Model Y is one of the best cars it has ever produced, but the Performance edition feels expensive and kind of pointless.

item.title: Our First Look at ‘Avengers: Doomsday’ Might Be Split Into Four Parts
item.description: Want to know what to expect from 'Avengers: Doomsday'? You'll be waiting in the theater or from your home for a month-long rollout.

item.title: The Nex Playground and Pixel Buds 2A top our list of the best deals this week
item.description: The Nex Playground is apparently one of the hottest consoles this holiday season thanks to its kid-friendly games and fun, motion-controlled gameplay. And now through December 14th, the cube-shaped console is on sale for its Black Friday low of around $199 ($50 off) at Amazon. There are some other great deals still available you might […]

item.title: Test de la Coros Pace 4 : une montre de sport légère et accessible, taillée pour la performance
item.description: Nouvelle montre entrée de gamme de Coros, la Pace 4 promet à la fois précision des données, format léger et écran Amoled lumineux. Voici son test complet.

item.title: TSA Sending Info on Domestic Travelers to ICE for Deportation Arrests
item.description: The program has been running since March but we're only learning about it now.

item.title: The best thing I bought this year: a portable mechanical keyboard
item.description: As a writer, I take the tools of my trade relatively seriously. I’m not crazy enough to drop $3,600 on a keyboard, but I also find typing on a MacBook for extended periods of time deeply unsatisfying — and distracting. So this spring, I started looking into distraction-free writing setups, which included an e-reader / […]

item.title: I switched from the iPhone 15 Pro to the iPhone 17 Pro, and I don't regret it – here's why
item.description: I upgraded my iPhone when I probably didn't need to – here are the main changes in two years of Apple development.

item.title: How to watch Flamengo vs. Pyramids FC online for free
item.description: How to watch FIFA Intercontinental Cup for free. Live stream Flamengo vs. Pyramids FC in the FIFA Intercontinental Cup for free.

item.title: Reportage vidéo – Avatar 3 : comment ce film bouleverse la tech dans le cinéma
item.description: Avatar : De feu et de cendres débarque au cinéma ce mercredi 17 décembre 2025. Plus qu'un blockbuster, c'est un défi technologique et nous proposons d'en découvrir les coulisses en vidéo.
